title: Tom Pidcock to Skip Cyclocross for Road-Centric Ambitions with Q36.5
content:
Pidcock hits pause on CX to ease into Q36.5: 'I want to make sure I have the time to settle into a new environment with my new team.'

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock to Skip Cyclocross for Road-Centric Ambitions with Q36.5 on Velo.
author: ahood
